resources.string: Hello Fans! We here at the Las Vegas Raiders are here to answer any questions you have. Please feel feel to contact us with any questions or concerns. Thanks!

string-array.name: details
string-array.item: Derek Carr #4 is the Quarterback of the LV Raiders. He is 29 years old, and was drafted in 2014 from Fresno St.
Josh Jacobs #28 is a Running Back of the LV Raiders. He is 23 years old, and was drafted in 2019 from Alabama.
Darren Waller #83 is a Tight End of the LV Raiders. He is 28 years old, and was drafted in 2015 from Georgia Tech.
Johnathon Abram #24 is a Safety of the LV Raiders. He is 24 years old, and was drafted in 2019 from Mississippi St.
Maxx Crosby #98 is a Defensive End of the LV Raiders. He 23 is years old, and was drafted in 2019 from Eastern Michigan
